Claims.value: Compliant with Codex Standard for Milk Chocolate

Appearance.value: Medium to light brown typical of milk chocolate

Flavour Profile.value: Sweet, creamy, balanced with cocoa-milk note, slight natural caramel or vanilla undertones, lingering chocolate flavour with good intensity

Texture.value: Smooth, crisp snap when bitten into, not chewy or soft

Milk Solids (Non-fat).value: Compliant with Codex Standard for Milk Chocolate

Fat Content.value: Compliant with Codex Standard for Milk Chocolate

Sugar Content.value: Compliant with Codex Standard for Milk Chocolate

Additives.value: Emulsifiers (e.g., lecithin), natural flavourings, vegetable oil, PGPR (below 5g/kg or 0.5%)

Processing Requirements.value: Must withstand enrobing, wrapping, and boxing; maintain softness during wrapping to avoid breaking

Processing Parameters.value: 40-60℃ in kibble melter for 90 mins per 1000kg; Ice cream at -37.5℃ during dipping; 118 seconds single index, 60 seconds double index wrapping time

Certifications.value: Halal Certified, RSPO Palm Oil (Segregated), GMO Free, Cocoa Certification (Rainforest Alliance, Fair Trade, Cocoa Horizons)

Ingredient Restrictions.value: No artificial trans fats, partially hydrogenated oils, high-fructose corn syrup, artificial colours, artificial flavours, preservatives, artificial sweeteners

Microbiological Parameters.value: Standard Plate Count Max 20,000 cfu/g, Salmonella absent in 25g, Enterobacteriaceae Max 10 cfu/g

Vegetable Fat Content.value: Permissible amounts as per FSC guidelines
Vegetable Fat Content.note: Vegetable oil and PGPR limits imply regulated vegetable fat content

Freezer Stability.note: Product is intended for enrobing ice cream sticks and sandwiches

Snap Texture.note: Explicitly mentioned as a desired characteristic for consumption

Flowability.value: To be determined during sample assessments

Regulatory Compliance.value: Codex Standard for Milk Chocolate, AFGC PIF 6.0, FSC guidelines

Cocoa Certification.value: Rainforest Alliance, Fair Trade, Cocoa Horizons
